snippet.title: ASTRO AQUA KITTY PlayStation trailer
snippet.description: The Aqua Kitty cats have launched into space in an all new Action RPG shoot-em-up adventure! Releasing on PS4 and PSVita on 15th April 2021!(also out now on Nintendo Switch, and coming soon to Xbox and PC).Pick your crew, then blast off to investigate mysterious water filled asteroids.Battle bizarre enemies, mine magnificent gems, grab new weapons, install enhancing devices, and unlock your crews' unique skills as you level up XP. Visit https://tikipod.com/astroaquakitty/ for more info and follow us on twitter ( @tikipodltd ) for news and updates!
